member.name: T:JetBrains.ActionManagement.ShellComponentsEx
member.summary: in this assembly.

member.name: M:JetBrains.ActionManagement.ActionManager.TryGetAction(System.String)
member.summary: Get an action by its ID. Returns Null if missing. Use , , wherever possible because they validate the action ID and assert that the action is of the required type with explicit error messages.

member.name: M:JetBrains.ActionManagement.ActionManager.GetUpdatableAction(System.String)
member.summary: Gets an updatable action by its unique ID. Fails if there is no such action or it is not updatable.

member.name: M:JetBrains.ActionManagement.ActionManager.GetExecutableAction(System.String)
member.summary: Gets an executable action by its unique ID. Fails if there is no such action or it is not executable.

member.name: M:JetBrains.ActionManagement.ActionManager.GetActionGroup(System.String)
member.summary: Gets an action group by its unique ID. Fails if there is no such action ID or it is not an action group.

member.name: M:JetBrains.ActionManagement.ActionManager.ExecuteActionUnsafe(JetBrains.ActionManagement.IExecutableAction)
member.summary: Call the method if and only if you're absolutely sure the action is available. Better call instead.

member.name: M:JetBrains.ActionManagement.ActionManager.ExecuteActionIfAvailable(JetBrains.ActionManagement.IExecutableAction)

summary.para: Calls on the action and, if the action is available, executes it.
It's an error if the action does not exist or is not executable.
It's not an error if the action is unavailable (False is returned in such a case).

member.returns: Whether the action was available (= was executed).

member.name: M:JetBrains.ActionManagement.ActionManager.ExecuteShortcut(System.Windows.Forms.Keys,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Attempts to execute the keyboard shortcut. Composite keyboard shortcuts, eg “Ctrl+K,F”, should be executed twice, once for each of the components.
member.param: The keyboard shortcut to execute. May be a part of a composite shortcut.
In a standalone configuration, has no meaning. In an embedded configurations, includes the host actions in the search list together with own actions managed by the action-manager.
member.returns: Whether the action has been executed.

member.name: M:JetBrains.ActionManagement.ActionManager.GetActivityIdByActionId(System.String)
member.summary: Converts ActionId into identifier used through VS

summary.para: Looks up the action in the main menu. If found, returns the step-by-step path to the action, including the name of the command that represents the action.

member.name: T:JetBrains.ActionManagement.ActionPresentation
member.summary: Visual presentation of an Action

member.name: F:JetBrains.ActionManagement.ActionPresentation.myFImageLoader
member.summary: If delay-loading image (see ), the function to perform the load. Cannot reference UI to call ImageLoader :(.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ActionManagement.ActionPresentation.myImage
member.summary: A ready-for-use image. Means either has been called with an explicit image instance, or with an image ID that has been loaded into an image upon someone's request.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ActionManagement.ActionPresentation.myImageId
member.summary: A delay-loaded image ID.

member.name: M:JetBrains.ActionManagement.ActionPresentation.EqualsImage(JetBrains.ActionManagement.ActionPresentation)
member.summary: Checks if images are the same (without actually calling Load).

member.name: M:JetBrains.ActionManagement.ActionPresentation.GetImage
member.summary: Get the image of the action. Could well be Null. If a delay-load image ID has been set with , tries loading the image and caches the result.

member.name: M:JetBrains.ActionManagement.ActionPresentation.HasLoadedImage
member.summary: Checks if we already have an image (set with explicitly, or already delay-loaded by from an ID given to ). Does not load anything on its own.

member.name: M:JetBrains.ActionManagement.ActionPresentation.SetImage(System.String,System.Func{System.String,System.Reflection.Assembly[],System.Drawing.Image},System.Reflection.Assembly[])
member.summary: Fluent. Sets a delay-load image.
member.param: ID of the image. Will be passed to the Image Loader. Used for equality.

ImageLoader (cannot call the class because it's in the UI assembly and we're lower than that). Pass ImageLoader.GetImage here. The result must always be non-Null (use image placeholder if image missing).
Hint assembly for looking for images in. Calling assembly by default.

member.name: M:JetBrains.ActionManagement.ActionPresentation.SetImage(System.Drawing.Image)
member.summary: Fluent. Sets a preloaded image, or resets the image on the action.

member.name: T:JetBrains.ActionManagement.IActionWithGroup
member.summary: Action with group (i.e. 'NavigateBackwards' or 'Undo' in visual studio). In menu represented as simple menu item, in toolbar - as toolbar button with drop-down menu.

member.summary: Updates action visual presentation. If presentation.Enabled is set to false, Execute will not be called.

member.name: M:JetBrains.ActionManagement.IActionHandler.Execute(JetBrains.ActionManagement.IDataContext,JetBrains.ActionManagement.DelegateExecute)
member.summary: Executes action. Called after Update, that set ActionPresentation.Enabled to true.

member.summary: ToString must provide a human-readable string for the shortcut.
